synthesis_conditions.amount_of_solvent: 3.5 mL of DMF and 150 μL of TFA
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with 45 mL of DMF (3x15 mL) and 45 mL of methanol (3x15 mL)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: soaked in hexane for 3 days, dried at room temperature

synthesis_conditions.amount_of_solvent: 3.5 mL of DMF and 40 μL of TFA
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with 45 mL of DMF (3x15 mL) and 45 mL of methanol (3x15 mL)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: soaked in hexane for 7 days, dried at room temperature

chemicals_used.H2TZDC: 0.3 to 17 equiv. (varied for different % of TZDC incorporation)

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: thoroughly washed with fresh DMF (40 mL × 5)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The maximum loading achieved was 50% of TZDC using 17 equivalents of H2TZDC.
